home.hero_subtitle: I turn ideas into reality and make them look good, even those that shouldn't. I use AI to improve things, not to blame it.

skills.skills_tagline: I don't seek to know everything, but to understand enough to do it well. What I know, I apply; what I don't, I learn quickly.
skills.skills_hard_laravel_desc: Experience in Laravel to create APIs, admin panels, and systems with secure authentication and best practices.
skills.skills_hard_astro_desc: Experience in Astro to build fast, optimized sites with an architecture focused on performance and scalability.
skills.skills_hard_javascript_desc: Experience in JavaScript to develop interactive, dynamic features focused on user experience.
skills.skills_hard_tailwindcss_desc: Experience in Tailwind CSS to create consistent, fast interfaces with an efficient development flow.
skills.skills_hard_react_desc: Experience in React to develop modular, reusable components.
skills.skills_hard_python_desc: Experience in Python to automate processes, analyze data, and experiment with AI tools.
skills.skills_soft_communication_desc: I express ideas clearly and listen to build solutions as a team.
skills.skills_soft_proactivity_desc: I take action without waiting for instructions, always seeking to improve results.
skills.skills_soft_analytical_desc: I analyze problems logically and with focus to find effective solutions.
skills.skills_soft_adaptability_desc: I easily adjust to new environments, challenges, and technologies.
skills.skills_soft_learning_desc: I constantly seek to learn and grow both professionally and personally.
skills.skills_soft_commitment_desc: I achieve goals with discipline, consistency, and a focus on work quality.

projects.projects_tagline: A look at what I can do when the deadline is near.
projects.project_4zlo_desc: A platform created to bring vintage style to the digital world. Allows you to explore and discover unique garments, with an intuitive and modern experience. Designed to offer easy management for the admin and smooth navigation for the client.
projects.project_portfolio_desc: A reflection of my work, process, and style as a developer. Built with Astro and optimized for performance, accessibility, and user experience.

experience.experience_tagline: Real projects, real challenges, measurable results.
experience.exp_1_desc: Responsible for improving and optimizing the institutional website, implementing solutions that optimize load times, integrate RESTful APIs, and enhance user experience.
exp_1_achievements: Redesigned the website focusing on usability and responsive design.
Implemented a custom chatbot for customer service.
Improved load times by optimizing static resources.
Integrated RESTful APIs for efficient frontend-backend communication.
experience.exp_2_desc: Collaborated in data processing, migration, and visualization, also participating in AI projects and information analysis.
exp_2_achievements: Supported migration and organization of databases.
Developed interactive dashboards for data visualization.
Participated in training an AI model for ocular diagnosis.

contact.contact_tagline: Every great result starts with a good conversation.

footer.title: Web Portfolio | Lucas Azana
footer.description: I like to create things that not only work, but also look good.
